thread.title: Police seek man who allegedly tried to abduct girl from Truro hotel | CTV Atlantic News
thread.title_full: Police seek man who allegedly tried to abduct girl from Truro hotel | CTV Atlantic News

author: CTV Atlantic
title: Police seek man who allegedly tried to abduct girl from Truro hotel | CTV Atlantic News
text:
Police in Truro, N.S. are looking for a man who allegedly tried to abduct an eight-year-old girl from a hotel on the weekend.
Police received a complaint about the incident around 5 p.m. Saturday. They say the man was unsuccessful and fled the hotel on foot.
The suspect is described as six-feet tall and may have a tattoo around one of his eyes. His face was partially covered at the time.
Anyone with information is asked to contact the Truro Police Service.
